alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 18 at 1:35PM PST until November 20 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT PST SUNDAY NIGHT... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts of 60 to 80 mph. * WHERE...Southern Ventura County Mountains, Interstate 5 Corridor and Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from midnight tonight to midnight PST Sunday night. For the High Wind Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Interstate 5 Corridor; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
